outputs.output_descr:
- TA operationalised in terms of office systems, organograms, staff, equipment
- M&E  framework  for TA developed
- Functional & competency analysis and assignment undertaken
- Regulations, administrative guidelines, standing orders and budget guidelines for county governments developed
- Civic education on devolution undertaken
- Capacity assessment and competency development on devolution
- Human resources audit undertaken at National and County levels
- Assets and liabilities audited in Counties

project_title: 2KEN012/205 Implementation of Devolved Govt in Kenya
